steps.name: Click on 'New Item' on the side menu
Click 'Save' button on the BaseConfigPage page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
click 'Manage Jenkins' link from Main page
Click Configure System link on ManageJenkins Page
Enter an email into 'SMTP server' field for 'Extended Email Notifications' section
